data.title: France: "Jamais sans toi" Music Video Released
data.meta_description: The official music video for "Jamais sans toi", the French entry for the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2018 has been released.
data.text:
The official music video for “Jamais sans toi”, the French entry for the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2018 has been released.

France Televisions has revealed the official music video for their entry for Junior Eurovision 2018. “Jamias sans toi” is to be performed by Angélina and is the singers first single. The song is tells the story of the strong links that unite Angélina and Pauline, her best friend.

The singer will be performing the bilingual song “Jamais sans toi” (Never without you). She was internally selected to represent France at the competition, having been named the winner of The Voice Kids in France last year. Angélina is 10 years old and will be the first female singer to represent France at Junior Eurovision.

There had been speculation for a number of weeks regarding whether Angélina would be the French representative in the competition.

Madame Monsieur who represented France at the Eurovision Song Contest 2018, will also be taking to the commentary booth this November. The duo will be joining Stéphane Bern as commentators as France returns to the Junior Eurovision Song Contest for the first time in fifteen years. France previously only participated in the contest once in 2004 when Thomas Pontier finished 6th in Lillehammar.

Source: France Televisions
